name: Mon-Musu Quest
description:
▼Overview

A few hundred years after the legendary hero, Rototo, defeated the Demonlord...
The king at that time came up with a new tax from Rototo's triumph.

"If the Demonlord were to appear and threaten us again, the
citizens would be charged with tax to support the hero."
...this was the origin of "Hero Tax".

The descendants of Rototo were supposed to receive benefit from it,
but the money from "Hero Tax" was so small that
they had trouble to just live on.

And because of the oppressive "Hero Tax", the citizens hated them.
The citizens did not allow them to earn money even if they worked..

And one day, the Demonlord actually rebirthed.

"You are gonna pay for the hero tax, Mr.Hero."
You, the descendant of the hero, and two girls...
are under pressure throughout the country, on their way to defeat the Demonlord...

▼Systems

Random encounter, and turn-based combat!
...Encounters randomly with monsters on the field!
Gain your level and learn various skills.

Make your way to the castle of the Demonlord!
...Since the citizens hate you, you have no equipment nor any idea of the destination...!?
Wander around the world to find the path to the castle!
